title: Free transfer from NA to OCE still available?
body:
Is the free transfer from North America to Oceania still available?

I remember seeing recently a post allowing free transfers to OCE due to the NA server changes but cannot remember the details.

I have an account on NA that hasn't been used in ~2 years, can I transfer this to OCE free of charge?

replies.body:
It's still available yes. You should have a free transfer if you were playing on NA from OCE. Check the accounts tab in the store - it should show 0 RP to OCE on your NA account.

If it doesn't you can contact player support.
